Device : SSA [device_ip]
Purpose: IPv6 Routing

>interface vlan [ipv6_vlan]
>ipv6 address  [ipv6_address] 
>no shutdown
>ipv6 forwarding
>exit
>set ip route [ipv6_network] [ipv6_next_hop]
